author: dinardo
body:
Quick test for pull request.
I was asked by @silviodonato to update the description: I'm the developer of the BeamPixel module and It has been a while since I didn't make any change. I recently went back to check what was the status of the module and its configuration since I feel like I'm still in charge of its good behavior.
title: Minor changes in beampixel_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py
